article:
People all over the world are learning English . Some learn at school , others study by _ . A few learn English by listening _ the radio.
Why do all these people want to learn English ? It's difficult to answer this question. Many children learn English at school because it is one of their subjects. Some people learn English because _ useful for their work. Many students often learn English for their _ education because at college some of the books they will use are written _ English .
It is not _ to learn a foreign language. But there is _ difficult in the world if you _ your heart into it .2-1-c-n-j-y
